Featured Projects

Wrap App

The Wrap App is a tool designed for Spotify users to easily view their top tracks, artists, and genres across their listening history at any time.

PythonFlaskPostgreSQLReactfeatured
Validating Executive Function Assessments for Adolescents in Peru

This research project was my dissertation for my MSc at the University of Oxford. I culturally validated the Oxford Cognitive Screen - Executive Function (OCS-EF) and the Rapid Assessment of Cognitive and Emotional Regulation (RACER) for use in adolescents from Peru.

PsychologyResearchfeatured
Perceptual Gamma Correction Experiment

This MATLAB project is used to simulate and estimate the gamma curve of a given device display using perceptual responses given by users. This information can be used to calculate the proportional difference between the light intensity of the display and the requested signal by the computer, then calibrate using the estimated gamma curve.

PsychologyMATLABfeatured
